titleStmt.title: An echo, or, The trumpeters triumph shewing the originall of a trumpet, from the alpha of Genesis to the omega of the Revelation very necessary and fit to be perused in these sad and mournfull times of all that wish wel to the peace of Ierusalem / written by E.F.
titleStmt.author: E. F. (Edward Ford), fl. 1630?-1660.
